name: Creality Sermoon V1 0.4 nozzle
machine_start_gcode:
;generated by SuperSlicer 1.5.0 on 2023-06-07 at 17:32:332
G90 ; use absolute coordinates
SET_PRINT_STATS_INFO TOTAL_LAYER=[total_layer_count]
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer]                       ; Set bed temp
M104 S170 ; set temporary nozzle temp to prevent oozing during homing
G28                                    ; Home
M105                                   ; Report Temps
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer]                        ; Wait for bed to reach target
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]                           ; Set hot end temp
M105                                   ; Report Temps
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]                           ; Wait for hot end to reach target
M105                                   ; Report Temps
M82                                    ; Absolute extrusion mode
#G28                                    ; Home
G92 E0                                 ; Reset Extruder
G1 Z2.0 F3000                          ; Move Z Axis up
G1 X173.0 Y10 Z0.28 F5000.0             ; Move to start position
G1 X173.0 Y170.0 Z0.28 F1500.0 E15      ; Draw the first line
G1 X173.4 Y170.0 Z0.28 F5000.0          ; Move to side a little
G1 X173.4 Y40 Z0.28 F1500.0 E30         ; Draw the second line
G92 E0                                 ; Reset Extruder
G1 Z2.0 F3000                          ; Move Z Axis up
G92 E0
START_PRINT
machine_end_gcode:
M140 S0                                ; Turn-off bed
M107                                   ; Turn off cooling fan
G91                                    ; Relative positioning
G1 E-1 F2700                           ; Retract
G1 E-2 Z0.2 F2400                      ; Retract and raise Z
G1 X5 Y5 F3000                         ; Wipe
G1 Z0.95                               ; Raise Z more
G90                                    ; Absolute positioning
G1 X10 Y160                            ; Eject print
M106 S0                                ; Turn off fan
M104 S0                                ; Turn-off hot end
M140 S0                                ; Turn-off bed
{ if max_layer_z < printable_height-10 }G1 Z{min(max_layer_z+70,printable_height-10)}; move print up {endif}; Eject print z (conditional)
M84 X Y E                              ; Disable steppers except Z
G92 E0                                 ; Reset Extruder
M82;abs extrusion
END_PRINT
machine_pause_gcode:
M25 ;pause print
; Sermoon V1 Marlin buffers commands, so flush with these G4 P10 commands
G4 P10
G4 P10
G4 P10
G4 P10
G4 P10
G4 P10
G4 P10
G4 P10
G4 P10
G4 P10
change_filament_gcode:
; S1 Pause For Filament change
M125
